msbt.message: Why can't I seem to net any bugs? I'm out here trying every day, but I've yet to catch anything! Do you think I need to try matching my breathing to theirs? Waitdo bugs even breathe like we do?
Not knowing what you'll reel in until you get a bite is part of what makes fishing fun for me.It's kind of like that feeling of anticipation when you unwrap a gift, .
If you take good care of them, flowers reward you with blooms.They can't talk to us in words, but I feel like our hearts can commune with each other.
Someday, I hope to share an umbrella with someone special while rain falls all around us Oh Just picturing it in my mind is making my heart swell up!
